Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 9th overall pick, by Pittsburgh in 1979...
Injured on 5/12/1980 with a Inflamed Posterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 6/23/1984 with a Hyper Extended Knee, out for one week...
Had first career hit (triple) on 5/12/1986, off John Verhoeven (ATL)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/2/1986, off Dan Petry (PHI)...
Injured on 8/16/1989 with a Strained Rib Cage Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 6/9/1990 with a Torn Abdominal Muscle, out for 5-6 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 6 RBI against Los Angeles on 6/13/1992...
Injured on 6/10/1993 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for 5 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 2/8/1995 to a 2-year deal worth $500,000 per year...
Drove in 6 runs against Oakland on 6/12/1995...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/2/1996, hitting .417 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
